text: "I Was Made For Dancin'" is a song by American-Norwegian singer Leif Garrett. It is from his 1978 album Feel the need. In October of that year, the song was released as a single in the United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and Japan. Europe followed in January 1979. Category:1978 songs Category:Leif Garrett songs
title: I Was Made for Dancin'
